EEBO.description: The EEBO parallel corpus mirrors the WWO corpus. The two corpora share approximately the same amount of words from each century available in the WWO corpus.

VWWP+WWP Morphadorned.shortDescription: Morphadorned Victorian Women Writers Project Corpus
VWWP+WWP Morphadorned.description: We have parsed the TEI of the VWWP and extracted its body content. It has been further regularized with Morphadorner.
